items.title: Intellect Design shares up 10% on strong volumes after launching 'Purple Fabric' AI system
items.description: Last week, the company shared a presentation with analysts and institutional investors on its new Enterprise AI platform called Purple Fabric, which is tailored for the financial and insurance sectors.

items.title: Why India Shelter stands out in the over-crowded low-cost housing finance space?
items.description: Niche market presence and the combined benefit of lower funding cost and operating leverage augur well for the company

items.title: Karnataka moves to tax mining land, leases; proposals may hurt NMDC, Vedanta, JSW Steel
items.description: This proposed bill comes after a recent Supreme Court order had allowed state governments to impose taxes on minerals. Key miners NMDC, Vedanta and JSW Steel are likely to be impacted the most by the proposed provisions.
